body.content: ={{ JSON.stringify({ model: $input.first().json.brain.model || 'gpt-4', messages: [{ role: 'system', content: 'You are a helpful assistant. Provide concise responses.' }, { role: 'user', content: $input.first().json.message }], temperature: $input.first().json.brain.temperature || 0.2 }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ model: $json.brain.model || 'kimi-k2.5', temperature: $json.brain.temperature ?? 0.2, messages: [{ role: 'system', content: 'You summarize messages for Slack. Be concise. Return plain text.' }, { role: 'user', content: $json.message }] }) }}
